markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Limited">[Elephant Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1100)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 76</row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying [elephant](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=46) or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus. This spell has the effects of [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=72), except you gain the following specific abilities instead of the form-specific abilities of _dinosaur form_.

 **Speed** 40 feet; **Melee** <actions string="Single Action" /> foot, **Damage** 2d8 bludgeoning; **Melee** <actions string="Single Action" /> trunk (reach 10 feet), **Effect** grabbing trunk; **Melee** <actions string="Single Action" /> tusk (reach 10 feet), **Damage** 2d6 piercing.

 **Grabbing Trunk** A creature up to two sizes smaller that's hit by your trunk is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). If you succeed at your [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) check against a creature grabbed by your trunk, you can reposition the creature to another space within your trunk's reach.

---
**Heightened (5th)** Your elephant form is Huge; your trunk and tusk attacks have 15-foot [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), and your foot attack has 10-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21.

**Heightened (7th)** Your elephant form is Gargantuan; your trunk and tusk attacks have 20-foot reach, and your foot attack has 15-foot reach. Your AC is 21 + your level and you instead gain 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.
name: Elephant Form
